title: Access Continuum Community Edition
creator: Level Access
description: Embed accessibility best practices into your entire software development lifecycle and prevent the most critical violations before you release. Access Continuum is the addition of our rich JavaScript accessibility testing library into an Automated Testing Framework.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
technology: All content states via test automation frameworks: A code snippet
A node in a rendered page
